citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the licensee was unable to provide records of disposition for one zebu and ten hedgehogs.
Every dealer and exhibitor shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose information
concerning all animals purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or
exhibitor. These records are necessary to assess the health and well-being of the animals on site and allow tracking of
animals being used for regulatory purposes and shall be held for a minimum of one year after the animal is euthanized or
disposed of. These records must be completed and made available to APHIS upon request.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At the time of inspection, the licensee was unable to provide records of disposition for one zebu and ten hedgehogs. 
Every dealer and exhibitor shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose information 
concerning all animals purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or 
exhibitor. These records are necessary to assess the health and well-being of the animals on site and allow tracking of 
animals being used for regulatory purposes and shall be held for a minimum of one year after the animal is euthanized or 
disposed of. These records must be completed and made available to APHIS upon request. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
